problem_names:
lemma act_act:
  assumes "g \<in> carrier G" and "h \<in> carrier G"
  shows "(b <o g) <o h = b <o (g \<otimes> h)"

lemma act_act_inv [simp]:
  assumes "g \<in> carrier G"
  shows "b <o g <o inv g = b"

lemma act_inv_act [simp]:
  assumes "g \<in> carrier G"
  shows "b <o inv g <o g = b"

lemma act_inv_iff:
  assumes "g \<in> carrier G"
  shows "b <o inv g = c \<longleftrightarrow> b = c <o g"
translations:
lemma act_act:
  assumes "g \<in> carrier G" and "h \<in> carrier G"
  shows "(b <o g) <o h = b <o (g \<otimes> h)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o g <o h = b <o g \<otimes> h
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o g <o h = b <o g \<otimes> h
from \<open>g \<in> carrier G\<close> and \<open>h \<in> carrier G\<close> and act_act'

proof (chain)
picking this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G
  ?g \<in> carrier G \<and> ?h \<in> carrier G \<longrightarrow>
  ?b <o ?g <o ?h = ?b <o ?g \<otimes> ?h
show "(b <o g) <o h = b <o (g \<otimes> h)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  h \<in> carrier G
  ?g \<in> carrier G \<and> ?h \<in> carrier G \<longrightarrow>
  ?b <o ?g <o ?h = ?b <o ?g \<otimes> ?h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o g <o h = b <o g \<otimes> h
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  b <o g <o h = b <o g \<otimes> h

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma act_act_inv [simp]:
  assumes "g \<in> carrier G"
  shows "b <o g <o inv g = b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o g <o inv g = b
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o g <o inv g = b
from \<open>g \<in> carrier G\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  g \<in> carrier G
have "inv g \<in> carrier G"

proof (prove)
using this:
  g \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv g \<in> carrier G
by (rule inv_closed)

proof (state)
this:
  inv g \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o g <o inv g = b
with \<open>g \<in> carrier G\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  inv g \<in> carrier G
have "b <o g <o inv g = b <o g \<otimes> inv g"

proof (prove)
using this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  inv g \<in> carrier G

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o g <o inv g = b <o g \<otimes> inv g
by (rule act_act)

proof (state)
this:
  b <o g <o inv g = b <o g \<otimes> inv g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o g <o inv g = b
with \<open>g \<in> carrier G\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  b <o g <o inv g = b <o g \<otimes> inv g
show "b <o g <o inv g = b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  b <o g <o inv g = b <o g \<otimes> inv g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o g <o inv g = b
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  b <o g <o inv g = b

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma act_inv_act [simp]:
  assumes "g \<in> carrier G"
  shows "b <o inv g <o g = b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o inv g <o g = b
using \<open>g \<in> carrier G\<close> and act_act_inv [of "inv g"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  inv g \<in> carrier G \<Longrightarrow> ?b <o inv g <o inv (inv g) = ?b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o inv g <o g = b
by simp

lemma act_inv_iff:
  assumes "g \<in> carrier G"
  shows "b <o inv g = c \<longleftrightarrow> b = c <o g"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (b <o inv g = c) = (b = c <o g)
proof

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. b <o inv g = c \<Longrightarrow> b = c <o g
 2. b = c <o g \<Longrightarrow> b <o inv g = c
assume "b <o inv g = c"

proof (state)
this:
  b <o inv g = c

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. b <o inv g = c \<Longrightarrow> b = c <o g
 2. b = c <o g \<Longrightarrow> b <o inv g = c
hence "b <o inv g <o g = c <o g"

proof (prove)
using this:
  b <o inv g = c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o inv g <o g = c <o g
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  b <o inv g <o g = c <o g

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. b <o inv g = c \<Longrightarrow> b = c <o g
 2. b = c <o g \<Longrightarrow> b <o inv g = c
with \<open>g \<in> carrier G\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  b <o inv g <o g = c <o g
show "b = c <o g"

proof (prove)
using this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  b <o inv g <o g = c <o g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b = c <o g
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  b = c <o g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b = c <o g \<Longrightarrow> b <o inv g = c
next

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b = c <o g \<Longrightarrow> b <o inv g = c
assume "b = c <o g"

proof (state)
this:
  b = c <o g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b = c <o g \<Longrightarrow> b <o inv g = c
hence "b <o inv g = c <o g <o inv g"

proof (prove)
using this:
  b = c <o g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o inv g = c <o g <o inv g
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  b <o inv g = c <o g <o inv g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b = c <o g \<Longrightarrow> b <o inv g = c
with \<open>g \<in> carrier G\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  b <o inv g = c <o g <o inv g
show "b <o inv g = c"

proof (prove)
using this:
  g \<in> carrier G
  b <o inv g = c <o g <o inv g

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b <o inv g = c
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  b <o inv g = c

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
end
